name: Flicker: Subsurface Blackout
description:
Something has breached the hull of your submarine! Work with Flavio, your robot assistant, to make it back to the control room and get the submarine back to the surface!

Move Left: "a" or "left arrow key"

Move Right: "d" or "right arrow key"

Jump: "space bar"

Flashlight: "j" or "c"

Security Panel Input: "w" or "up arrow key"
